forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 45F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 27F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers around in the morning. Then a light wintry mix expected in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers around in the morning. Then a light wintry mix expected in the afternoon. High around 30F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 32F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
